import React from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useGlobalContext } from '../context'; import { Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; const SingleBeerScreen = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const { searchSingleBeer, data, loading, isError, } = useGlobalContext(); searchSingleBeer(`/${id}`); return ( <> {loading &&

} {isError &&
ERROR
